item.title: Marius Borg Høiby, 28, has been charged with 32 offences, including four counts of rape, a prosecutor said. He denies the most serious accusations against him, but plans to plead guilty to some lesser charges when the trial starts. #MariusBorgHøiby #Princ
item.description: Marius Borg Høiby, 28, has been charged with 32 offences, including four counts of rape, a prosecutor said. He denies the most serious accusations against him, but plans to plead guilty to some lesser charges when the trial starts. #MariusBorgHøiby #Princ
